body: @zombieadd That would be just nerfing the doujin. Sexy pee pee doujin --> Downgrade to decent artbook doujin

I identified three ways of peeing here: Trying to hold it in, bursting it out and just peeing normally Chino seems to pee it normally, and does it in a sexy pose Megu seems to be in between normally and bursting it out, and her pose is sort of inviting someone to ask what's happening there Maya pretty much bursts it out, even though it seemed like she didn't need to. Maybe she just pisses like that Cocoa bursts it out, and it's noticeable how stubborn she is about staying with Chino, she only got up at zero seconds remaining lol
Sharo holds it in a lot, and i wanted to see her reaction if someone touched her back while she was peeing or after it
Rize does a controlled burst. Quite weird she didn't have time to get nopan though Chiya is pretty normal and controlled. Quite ero too~ Truly i have nothing else to do
Take out the urination parts and you've got a decent artbook.
